Active Now Offline Onboard image I\'m a New User I\'m a Returning User Profile selection image Name field icon User id copy User id qr Image EXPORT MY PROFILE Copied Open Source Edition Telemesh is a messaging app designed with Blockchain and Mesh networking. Unlike traditional messaging app Telemesh works with both internet and without internet connectivity. Telemesh is actively maintained by W3 Engineers Ltd. Copyright 2019 W3 Engineers Ltd. Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0

<font color=\'#083480\'>I’m a new user</font> <font color=\'#083480\'>Continue</font> <font color=\'#ff5f25\'>WARNING!!</font> <font color=\'#ff5f25\'>Update!!</font> To smoothly use all features of Teleemsh app please update Telemesh Service app. <font color=\'#083480\'>Later</font> I Understand Telemesh has some important updates on the latest release. This app won\'t work unless you update the latest version of Telemesh. Terms of Use
%s Interruption %s turned off. Telemesh would not work properly. %s permission is disabled. Telemesh would not work properly.
To deliver the best experience TeleService needs a few system permissions.\n\nPlease go to your device settings and search for Permissions. \nFrom Permissions screen tap “Other Permissions” then tap TeleService. \nAllow all the permissions from TeleService screen which are not marked as green. \n\nAlternatively, you can also go “Other Permissions” screen by Manage apps > TeleService > Other permissions.
